statements: DELETE FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 AND payment_gateway = 'PayPal';
DELETE FROM payments WHERE source_account_number IN ('123456', '789012');
DELETE FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 AND payment_status = 'pending';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount < 500 AND transaction_status = 'completed';
DELETE FROM bank_transactions WHERE transaction_date < '2022-01-01' AND status = 'rejected'
DELETE FROM payment_gateways WHERE gateway_id = (SELECT gateway_id FROM payment_gateways WHERE gateway_name = 'Stripe')
DELETE FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 456 AND email = 'example@example.com';
DELETE FROM bank_accounts WHERE customer_id = 3 AND account_type = 'Checking';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Transfer' AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
